name: Purplu Logistics
tag_list: logistics, real-time, gps, nfc, barcode, wms, erp, crm
overview:
Purplu is a chilean Startup born in 2012, specialized in logistics. Its team members are involved in barcode, RFID, technologies and development and started working together as part of Id-Latam, an auto-id company founded by 2 of its team members back in 2005.

The differenciating aspect of Purplu is to conceive a powerful logistic platform based on iOS, reading barcodes and NFC, and changing the focus of logistics from pictures to actual movements.

The startup has been accelerated by Wayra Chile(Telefónica) for the 2013 period with 50.000 USD.

Furthermore, the company has already sold the solution to first customers in arround 30000 USD, being one of the first interested a Mining Company, not just any, but the biggest Copper Mine in the world, Escondida, from BHP Billiton.

Future is projected to keep defining the Mining, Seafood and Industrial Segments they are targetting right now.
